short_summary: Supply New Waste Compactors and Installation
description: This procurement will provide the Correctional Service of Canada with two waste compactors, including hydraulic pumps and controls, with one receiver bin to their existing location at Atlantic Institution in Renous, New Brunswick. Labour and installation costs are also included in the bid.
tags: title-titre-eng":"Supply New Waste Compactors and Installation"
